pages.text: Early game, you'll want to maximize your ore yield. Head to the $(l:intro/mountains)mountains$() for the most coal and iron, and even some emeralds!
Legend has it that gold pickaxes possess fortune enchants, making them perfect for targeted mining. They break fast but can pay for themselves quickly!
Craft the gavel from $(l:mod_info/forbidden_arcanus)Forbidden & Arcanus$() to boost your ore drops. It's like having your own personal leprechaun, minus the rainbows.
Once you have silk touch, you can automate ore doubling with the squeezer from $(l:mod_info/integrated_dynamics)Integrated Dynamics$(), and the crushing wheel from $(l:mod_info/create)Create$().
